text: Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.
Just wanted to respond here and say I LOVE the way you worded that post with the `Who Does It Benefit, Value To Be Gained, Description`  heading. Very direct and to the point. :upvote:

>  But your idea would be pretty sweet. How would the color picker in the dnd editor show this, though?
<@U3T21PDBK> Yeah, that's something to think about. They could do it like Google Chrome does, or very similarly: <https://youtu.be/TuR27BxCRVk?t=77> Which is basically how they already have the brands there. They would just need to add an arrow to the right like Chrome does, or have some similar UI solution.
